"""

if S[A] == "-" and S[:A].isdecimal() and S[A+1:].isdecimal():
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")
"""

"""
-----Additional Explanation-----

The isdecimal() method returns True if all characters in a string are decimal characters. If not, it returns False.

-----Reference-----
https://www.w3schools.com/python/ref_string_isdecimal.asp
"""

input_str = input()
A, B = map(int, input_str.split())
S = input()

if len(S) == A + B + 1 and S[A] == '-' and S[:A].isdigit() and S[A+1:].isdigit():
    print('Yes')
else:
    print('No')
